666830.name: Longsword Tabletop Tactics Demo
666830.description:
Longsword brings turn-based tabletop tactics to the digital world of PC Gaming. In Longsword, you will collect and build an army comprised of miniature champions, spells, equipment, and structures. You can then customize the appearance of your army and enter it into battle on a hex-based tabletop battlefield!

We are on Kickstarter now, and this demo is to provide you with a look at what the project is. We hope you'll back our project. In this demo, all of the available cards are unlocked, but we only have about 150 of the planned 400 in the release set available for play.
666830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
